thread.title: BRIEF-Engility Q4 GAAP Loss Per Share $1.62

title: BRIEF-Engility Q4 GAAP Loss Per Share $1.62
text: March 1, 2018 / 9:42 PM / in 3 minutes BRIEF-Engility Q4 GAAP Loss Per Share $1.62 Reuters Staff March 1 (Reuters) - Engility Holdings Inc: * ENGILITY REPORTS FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL YEAR 2017 RESULTS; ESTABLISHES 2018 GUIDANCE * Q4 REVENUE $465 MILLION * Q4 GAAP LOSS PER SHARE $1.62 * SEES Q4 2017 GAAP LOSS PER SHARE $1.62 INCLUDING ITEMS * SEES Q4 2017 REVENUE $465 MILLION * SEES 2018 ‍REVENUE OF $1.83 BILLION TO $1.91 BILLION ​ * SEES 2018 ‍GAAP DILUTED EPS OF $0.81 TO $0.91​ * SEES 2018 OPERATING CASH FLOW OF $100 MILLION TO $110 MILLION​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
